title: Alpha
deck: Got questions about life? Eager to explore Christianity further?
article:
Alpha Online is an opportunity for people to investigate the Christian faith for themselves.

Alpha is really for anyone who's curious. Exploring topics such as 'Is there more to life than this?' and 'Who is Jesus?'.

Each week will involve watching a 20-25 minute presentation, followed by an online discussion via video call.

Our next Alpha starts on Tuesday 12th January 2021 at 7.30pm and runs for 7 weeks.

Sign up at
